ygData.subject: Re: Tinkering and raising skill level
ygData.msgSnippet: Yesterday I was fighting in CB and two GMs walked by me (yes I know how rare that is) then I asked them both if they know ANYTHING about tinkering skill in
ygData.messageBody:
Yesterday I was fighting in CB and two GMs walked by me (yes I know how rare
that is) then I asked them both if they know ANYTHING about tinkering skill
in terms of lowering component prices increasing skill rates or even reusable
pieces and they said and I quote "I honestly have no idea as to future plans
of tinkering skill" so maybe this is helpful maybe it is not. Remember that
I asked 2 GMs at the same time and they both gave the same answer.

Roj
